content.svp: Increase revenues by digitalizing your B2B sales channel
content.parent_description: B2B Commerce involves business functionality required for setting up business models in a B2B context, for example, managing accounts, organisation structures, cost centers, and budgets as well as quote management, approval workflows, and so on. ​
description: Increase revenue by digitalizing B2B sales processes on a leading commerce platform.
Allow customers to self-serve when managing their specific organisaton and account structures as well as cost centers, budgets, and approvals on your digital commerce channel.
Allow customers to buy your products and services at a time that suits them ​by allowing online quoting and negotiations tightly integrated with your traditional sales process.​

B2B Commerce.description: B2B Commerce involves business functionality required for setting up business models in a B2B context, for example, managing accounts, organisation structures, cost centers, and budgets as well as quote management, approval workflows, and so on. ​

content.svp: Create new revenue streams and maximize profits with bundling and subscription-based business models
content.parent_description: Bundling, configuration, and subscriptions involves the ability to combine products, services, and promotions into product bundles with specific subscription-based pricing models.​
description: Maximize profits by using different pricing models, whether you sell a product individually or in a bundle.
Reduce cost of ownership and create new revenue streams with subscription-based pricing models for products, services, and promotions.
Increase sales and loyalty by simplifying the shopping experience.

content.svp: Enable seamless shopping cart and checkout experiences
content.parent_description: Cart and checkout involves enabling seamless shopping cart and checkout scenarios.​
description: Allow customers to add products and services to a shopping cart.
Run promotions on cart level.
Setup checkout flows for known and guest users and integrate with your relevant providers for payment, tax, and shipment.
Benefit from seamless integration into order orchestration and management.​

Cart and Checkout.description: Cart and checkout involves enabling seamless shopping cart and checkout scenarios.​

content.svp: Interact with customers using their channel of choice with the conversational commerce chatbot
content.parent_description: Commerce chatbots involve interacting with customers using their channel of choice and providing permanent assistance to help them with their queries. ​
description: Interact with customers in the social messenger channel of their choice to provide a covenient conversational shopping experience.
Provide permanent assistance to customers as and when they need it, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Enable customers to search for products, retrieve information on a product, add products to shopping carts and favorites, view current shopping carts, and complete the check-out. process.

Commerce Chatbots.description: Commerce chatbots involve interacting with customers using their channel of choice and providing permanent assistance to help them with their queries. ​

content.svp: Influence and accelerate purchase decisions in a scalable way with SAP Jam Communities
content.parent_description: Commerce communities involves building online communities for customers, resellers, and distributors to collaborate, enabling you to undertand your customers’ needs and interests, and offer relevant content to guide the final purchase decision.
description: Attract and instill buying confidence by offering relevant and authentic content.
Address customer’s questions at scale before, during and after the purchase.
Establish strong customer relationships and inspire loyalty through engagement.

Commerce Communities.description: Commerce communities involves building online communities for customers, resellers, and distributors to collaborate, enabling you to undertand your customers’ needs and interests, and offer relevant content to guide the final purchase decision.

content.svp: Differentiate yourself by implementing innovative extensions quickly and by integrating the commerce solution to other applications
content.parent_description: Commerce integration and extensibility involves functionality required to integrate with SAP and third party solutions as well as to extend provided functionality for specific demands. ​
description: Gain efficiency and time by using ready made integration flows between SAP solutions.
Reduce project effort by integrating with third party solutions with standard integration technology.
Adapt the commerce experience to your specific needs by building micro-service extensions that are unique to your business​.

Commerce Integration and Extensibility.description: Commerce integration and extensibility involves functionality required to integrate with SAP and third party solutions as well as to extend provided functionality for specific demands. ​

content.svp: Enable B2B and B2C organizations to launch, grow, and operate online marketplaces at scale
content.parent_description: Commerce marketplace involvesenabling B2B and B2C organizations to launch, grow, and operate online marketplaces at scale
description: Integrate inventory and catalog data by automating product and category mapping.
Increase effectiveness with seller performance analytics and ratings, KPI dashboards, and a user-friendly messaging portal.
Boost customer loyalty with a sophisticated consumer experience and customer information tracking.
Leverage integration with SAP Commerce Cloud and install quickly without interruption of existing storefronts.

content.svp: Increase efficiency in operating your enterprise grade commerce platform

description: Increase operational excellence by managing your build and deployments on the hyperscaler infrastructure.
Secure operations by monitoring your commerce platform end-to-end.​

Commerce Platform Operations.description: Commerce platform operations involves build, deployment, operations, and monitoring of the commerce solution.​

content.svp: Drive conversion and loyalty by delivering engaging, differentiated, and personal commerce experiences
content.parent_description: Commerce storefront involves the management and provisioning of template storefronts that allow for a quick time to value in setting up and operating your commerce frontend.​
description: Go to market fast by adapting a fully featured, state-of-the-art commerce storefront template to your specific business needs.
Build your customer experience on a framework which uses the latest frontend technology that enables the creation of differentiated, personalized, and innovative experiences with fast load times. ​

Commerce Storefront.description: Commerce storefront involves the management and provisioning of template storefronts that allow for a quick time to value in setting up and operating your commerce frontend.​

content.svp: Create individualized experiences for customers in real time across their commerce journey
content.parent_description: Contextual real-time personalization involves capturing and analyzing contextual and behavioral data across the customer journey to create individualized experiences for customers in real time.
description: Capture and analyze contextual and behavioral data across each customer’s commerce journey, to receive real-time insights into your customers’ intentions and affinities and to create individualized customer experiences.

Keep up with visitors’ interests to turn them into buyers, with the ability to continuously adjust your merchandising mix and monitor buying trends, driving conversion rates, raising order value, and increasing customer satisfaction and loyalty.
Dynamically assign and reassign customers to segments for even deeper personalization in real time.​

content.svp: Deliver real-time, one-to-one personalization with every interaction
content.parent_description: Contextual real-time personalization involves capturing and analyzing contextual and behavioral data across the customer journey to create individualized experiences for customers in real time.
description: Deepen relationships with your customers by turning data-backed insights into personalized, real-time engagements.
Build segments using AI algorithms that predict what customers are likely to do next based on past behavior.
Increase acquisition, purchase frequency, average order value, and retention by automating customer engagement across the customer lifecycle.

content.svp: Deliver real-time, one-to-one personalization and merchandizing with every interaction across the commerce journey
content.parent_description: Contextual real-time personalization involves capturing and analyzing contextual and behavioral data across the customer journey to create individualized experiences for customers in real time.
description: Deepen relationships with your customers by turning data-backed insights into personalized, real-time engagements.

Capture and analyze contextual and behavioral data across each customer’s commerce journey, to receive real-time insights into your customers’ intentions and interests to create individualized customer experiences.

Turn visitors into buyers with with machine learning and performance metrics that continuously adjust your merchandizing and personalization to deliver on click-through rate, conversion rates, average order value, purchase frequency, and retention; automating customer engagement across the customer lifecycle.

Contextual Real-Time Personalization.description: Contextual real-time personalization involves capturing and analyzing contextual and behavioral data across the customer journey to create individualized experiences for customers in real time.

description: Deliver an exceptional customer experience across omnichannel touch points by integrating all channels and touch points on a single commerce platform using headless commerce APIs.
Improve flexibility and agility by adding new touch points as they emerge.​

content.svp: Put customers at the center of commerce with omnichannel order fulfillment options
content.parent_description: Order orchestration and management involves streamlining commerce operations by processing, controlling, and routing orders from any touch point as well as allowing buyers to get an instant view of their recent and current orders. ​
description: Streamline operations by capturing, processing, allocating, and routing orders from and to any touch point.
Drive growth by handling large volumes of orders at peak times.
Reduce overhead stock levels, improve delivery efficiencies, and cut shipping costs with omnichannel fulfillment options and enabling customers to buy, pick up, and return anywhere.

content.svp: Enable businesses to offer rewards in exchange for used products that will be refurbished and resold
content.parent_description: Recomerce management involves enabling businesses to offer rewards, in store and online, in exchange for used products that will be refurbished and resold. It includes managing products in your catalog that are eligible for your recommerce program and the eligible conditions, managing offers and incentives for those products, and processing the used products through authentication, cleaning, and repairs.
description: Manage which products in your catalog are eligible for your recommerce program and the conditions you are willing to accept those products in when a customer submits them.
Manage the offers and incentives you are willing to give for products in different conditions.
Enable customers to trade-in their items online or in-store.
Enable employees to process used products through authentication, cleaning, and repairs.
Empower Recommerce managers to have visibility into inventory at various stages of the recommerce process.

Recommerce Management.description: Recomerce management involves enabling businesses to offer rewards, in store and online, in exchange for used products that will be refurbished and resold. It includes managing products in your catalog that are eligible for your recommerce program and the eligible conditions, managing offers and incentives for those products, and processing the used products through authentication, cleaning, and repairs.

description: Create on-demand audiences based on the unified customer profile and data insights collected.
Relay the right message at the right time to customers across any channel at scale, using preconfigured connectors with real-time customer journeys.
Make account, contact, and household data available when needed.

description: Gain a holistic view of your customer by unifying customer data around a foundation identity, connecting back-office data to the front office, and processing high-volumes of customer date for use in other applications.

Address data privacy and governance requirements across all brands and regions by combining customers’ identity and purpose data and orchestrating the data across engagement systems based on data privacy permissions.

Customer Data Platform.description: Customer data platform involves unifying anonymous and known first-party, second-party, and third-party data, ensuring customer data privacy and governance, and leveraging real-time customer insights to deliver hyper-personalized experiences.

Workflow and Collaboration.description: Workflow and collaboration involves providing product-related content authored by business users from different organizations and defining tasks and access rights through advanced rights and role management. ​
